title: Salesforce Signs Definitive Agreement to Acquire Spindle AI
original_title: Salesforce Signs Definitive Agreement to Acquire Spindle AI
content_html: Salesforce has signed a definitive agreement to acquire Spindle AI, a leading agentic analytics platform. Spindle AIs technology combines advanced AI agents and machine learning with powerful data modeling to help businesses make faster and more effective rel"noreferrer noopener" href"https://www.linkedin.com/in/ryanatallah/"Ryan Atallah, previously the founder of ClearGraph (acquired by Tableau) and Carson Kahn, previously the founder and CTO of Volley ML (JPMorgan InResidence), Spindle AI has deep expertise in multi-agent systems, machine learning, and high-performance data applications. Spindle AIs agentic technology complements world-class analytics platforms, like Tableau, by focusing on the next step: using AI to autonomously model agentic scenarios and forecast business outcomes. The future of the agentic enterprise isnt about having the most data, its about making that data speak a common language, said Adam Evans, EVP GM, Salesforce AI Platform, Salesforce. Bringing Spindle AI which includes veteran leaders and incredibly talented engineers with deep expertise in advanced agentic analytics and machine learning onboard will continue our investment in Agent Observability and Self-Improvement to help us deliver custom agentic analytics, ROI forecasting, and continuous optimization for every Agentforce user. Enterprises and their agents are generating more data than ever, but its value remains locked behind technical complexity, making it difficult for teams to get reliable answers to critical business questions. While AI agents promise to bridge this gap, delivering the required accuracy, context, flexibility, sophistication, and security, and context at enterprise scale demands advanced agentic systems and machine learning capable of autonomously analyzing data, modeling scenarios, and discovering optimal answers. Spindle AI was built to solve this challenge by combining neuro-symbolic AI agents with AI-native data systems to generate optimize scenario models in seconds.
